description: This is an ESLint configuration file for a Vue.js project using TypeScript. It imports various ESLint plugins and configs, and exports a default configuration with file patterns and plugin settings.

methods.name: defineConfigWithVueTs
methods.description: Defines and exports the ESLint configuration, accepting different config sections for Vue, TypeScript, and testing.

parameters.name: baseConfig
parameters.description: Main configuration object specifying file patterns and plugin configurations.

parameters.name: additionalConfigs
parameters.description: Additional configuration objects for exclusion patterns and plugins.
